description: Variation of condition 2 (development according to the approved plans) of planning permission 2018/ 3247 granted on 31/10/2018 for the Erection of part single, part two, part three storey rear extensions, erection of roof extensions to create an additional storey, erection or rear outbuilding and associated alterations to facilitate use of the ground floor for retail or caf?/restaurant use (use class A1 or A3) and the upper floors as three self-contained dwellings The effect of the variation is to alter internal layout of the first floor flat by converting the approved 1x2 bed to 2x studio units (use class C3) comprising 3 x 2 bed units.
site_name: No. 1-3, Chatsworth Road Hackney London E5 0LH
